material.text: It is made from wood, bad idea for weapon.
It is made from wood. Hope it won't break.
It looks like some processed branch.
It is made from iron, standard weapon material.
There is some rust on it.
It is made from steel, a strong material.
It is made from silver. Why is it so?
Not so hard as steel. But it is still metal.
It shines a bit in light.
It is made from strange green metal.
It is made from strange yellow metal.
The material is super hard and super heavy.
It is made from strange violet metal.
I can barely feel it's weight.

rareness.text: Using it may be dangerous to you.
There is nothing special in it.
It was definitely created by a master.
